content.content: En los tiempos que estamos  los nft están cogiendo mucho impulso para mi opinión tal vez crear un nft game unido a uniswap y que puedas incluso farmear tokens, incentivado por un airdrop podría atraer a más parte de la comunidad, abro el debate si fuera viable o si merece la pena?
content.GPT-summary: The author proposes the creation of an NFT game linked to Uniswap, where players can farm tokens and receive incentives through airdrops. The author is asking for feedback on the viability and worthiness of the proposal. A third party is giving constructive criticism and asking questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback

content.content: In case some of you didn’t understand David 1992 post this is a translation: In these times, the nft are gaining a lot of momentum for my opinion, maybe create an nft game linked to uniswap and that you can even farm tokens, encouraged by an airdrop could attract more part of the community, I open the debate if it were viable or  if it’s worth it?
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
